TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed GeneratorDirection extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the direction in which item generation will occur. GeneratorDirection is used by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IItemContainerGenerator.StartAt%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GeneratorDirection Backward = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies to generate items in a backward direction.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GeneratorDirection Forward = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies to generate items in a forward direction.
